title: Aretha Franklin postpones concerts in Oklahoma, citing busy travel schedule
content:
DURANT, Okla. - Aretha Franklin is postponing two upcoming concerts in Oklahoma, citing a busy travel schedule. 
  
The Queen of Soul released a statement Friday saying she was rescheduling her Oct. 17 concert in Durant and Oct. 22 show in Tulsa.
